DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the immune response and reactogenicity of H5N1 vaccination in subjects aged 6 months to 17 years compared to seasonal flu vaccination
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity, Safety and Tolerability of Two Doses of a Pre-pandemic Influenza Vaccine in Participants Aged 6 Months to 17 Years
DOC.criteria: Healthy subjects Receipt of Seasonal Influenza Vaccine for season 2007/2008 Receipt of another vaccine within 3 weeks before and after each vaccination Previous vaccination with a pandemic candidate vaccine and/or vaccine containing the adjuvant MF59 or a similar adjuvant Children who are in the local recommendation for influenza vaccination due to underlying diseases
DOC.keyword: virus strain with the potential to cause pandemic
